name: Dexterity S
description:
Dexterity S - this arcade game where you control the ball with your finger. The main objective of the game is simple and straightforward: to avoid obstacles. For each covered obstacle you get points.

Features:

- Simple operation with one finger.

- Exciting gameplay, requiring concentration.

- Beautiful minimalist graphics.

- World table of records. Can you become # 1 in the world?
